channel.title: Choice method
channel.description:
How can I make it so that when I click the first option in this: [IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/0012.png[/img] make me teleport to X = 3414 and Y = 3488
this is my code: [code] case 127: choice("Yes teleport me so I can kick their asses.", "No Im a pussy and Im scared of flying axes"); break;[/code]
I already got the actionButtonID of the first option (9157) but when I add this case [code] case 9157: triggerTele(3414, 3488, 0); break;[/code] it doesnt do anything

item.title: Choice method
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Ok so I get 9157, and I add this:

case 9157: triggerTele(3414, 3488, 0); break;
And it does nothing, and my run.bat says that the actionButtonID is 0 now…

Read full topic

item.title: Choice method
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Find the actionButton ID of the text string, then add the case to trigger the teleport.[/quote]Umm how do i find the actionbutton id?

item.title: Choice method
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

A method you could use is to go ingame and choose that teleport and then type in ::mypos, giving you the coordinates of that teleport and trying to find it within a file…

Read full topic
